name: Bridal Veil Falls
description: A stunning 607-foot waterfall nestled in Provo Canyon, easily accessible and perfect for hiking, picnicking, and photography.

name: Provo Canyon
description: A scenic canyon offering outdoor activities like hiking, biking, and fishing, with picturesque views and natural beauty.

name: Monte L. Bean Life Science Museum
description: Located on the BYU campus, this museum features extensive exhibits on wildlife and ecosystems, making it an educational stop for all ages.

name: Provo City Center Temple
description: A beautifully restored historic building serving as a temple for The Church of Jesus Christ of Latter-day Saints, notable for its architecture and serene grounds.

name: The Y Trail
address: Trailhead near 1200 E 820 N, Provo, UT 84604
description: A popular hiking trail leading to a large concrete 'Y' on the mountainside, offering panoramic views of Provo and Utah Valley.

name: Provo Pioneer Village
description: Experience 19th-century pioneer life through restored buildings and artifacts in this living history museum.

name: Provo Farmers Market
address: Pioneer Park, 500 W Center St, Provo, UT 84601
description: Held at Pioneer Park from June to October, this market features local produce, crafts, and live entertainment, providing a taste of the local community.

name: Mount Timpanogos
address: Trailheads accessible via American Fork Canyon, UT
description: A challenging hike that rewards adventurers with breathtaking views, alpine meadows, and the chance to explore Timpanogos Cave National Monument nearby.

name: Historic Downtown Provo
description: A vibrant area filled with unique shops, restaurants, and cultural venues, offering a glimpse into the city's rich history and contemporary life.

name: Provo River Parkway Trail
address: Trail access points throughout Provo, including Canyon Glen Park and Paul Ream Wilderness Park
description: A scenic trail perfect for walking, running, or biking, stretching through Provo Canyon and offering beautiful views along the Provo River.

name: Provo Beach
description: An indoor family fun center featuring activities like surfing on a FlowRider, ropes courses, and arcade games, suitable for all ages.

name: Castle Amphitheater
description: A unique outdoor venue known for hosting concerts and events, set against a picturesque backdrop that adds charm to any performance.
